points: Skilled at architecting and implementing APIs, applications, and libraries
Loves solving challenging tasks with inventive tactics

description: Extremely efficient Arch Linux development environment.

details.tagline: Cornerstone, an es6 web framework built on express.js
description: Node.js framework that takes advantage of ECMAScript 6 features through the use of [babel](https://babeljs.io/).
Used in production on a growing number of apps both large and small.
Used to create both an [rpgmmo prototype](https://github.com/rosshadden/engine-mmo) and a simple [pong clone](https://github.com/rosshadden/engine-pong).

details.tagline: XPath helpers for XML in Sublime Text
description: Copy XPath at cursor(s) to clipboard.
Updates status bar text to XPath of current line.

items.title: Software Architect and Engineer
details: Develop both internal and external applications.

items.title: Software Architect and Engineer
details: Create custom web applications for a wide range of clients and purposes.
Created and now improve in-house Node.js framework, Cornerstone.
Publish and contribute to multiple open-source libraries and tools.

items.title: Senior Software Developer
details: Built large-scale custom applications for internal use by insurance companies.
Implemented complex form logic adhering to industry standards, with rich user-interfaces.
Administered Linux/Windows servers and network devices as a team member.

items.title: Freelance Web Developer
details: Designed and developed outward-facing web application.

items.title: Information Systems Analyst
details: Maintained servers, computers, databases, and cash registers across the park
Designed, developed, and implemented websites in use on the company-wide Intranet
Administered Active Directory, Exchange, and other servers as a team member
Fixed computer, network, and point-of-sale issues across the company.

items.title: A WebSocket-based Approach to Transporting Web Application Data
